title: How to be bad - according to my teams adc (as j4)
body:
Step 1 - go full tank with titanic hydra, end 7/10/40 (375cs)
Step 2 - Take most dmg in game
Step 3 - Do most dmg to champs in whole game

Bonus Step - give your adc a quadra

Congrats you are now bad and should get good

Why do players think like this?

replies.body: step 4, get a C- for some reason, not enough cs
